website_summaries.verdict: Your little girl will be thrilled that she can put these stylish pink pads on all by herself. Just be aware this set is better for knee and elbow protection than wrists.
pros: Includes one pair of pink knee pads, one pair of elbow pads, and one pair of wrist guards
Made of durable, soft EVA padded material with plastic plates
Bio-Foam padding for comfort and cooling
Have a little give compared to hard plastic shell style
Easy for children to put on themselves
cons: Wrist guards may seem large compared to the sizing for the rest of the set

customer_reviews.title: Lifesavers
customer_reviews.text: I bought my four-year-old girls some skates a while back and these have absolutely saved them from broken bones and horrible scrapes. Basically, my girls suck at skating and fall all the time. I don't even want to think about what would have happened without these. One time one of the knee pads got out of place and just ONE FALL one of them scraped her knee and it was apparently the end of the world. So these are lifesavers. They stay on just fine on a four year old.
customer_reviews.author: J. Humphreys

customer_reviews.title: Cute and functional
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her pink protectors, she really uses it to skate but she does very well with that. And additionally my daughter is 5 years old and perfect fit
customer_reviews.author: CARLOS CASTELLANO

customer_reviews.title: Aweful product!!
customer_reviews.text: Very bad quality. Don’t waste your money. The Velcro is so poor quality that it scratched my 5 year old’s arm and knees so bad that she is not at all ready to wear them again. It’s better to get hurt after you fall than getting hurt after you wear them. Aweful!!!!
customer_reviews.author: S.A.

customer_reviews.title: Great looking pads!
customer_reviews.text: Everything looks good with each pad. I chose these, instead of the many others available, because of the size and width of the velcro and the padding, which the padding looks as adequate as any of the others offered. My grand daughter hasn't tried them on yet so I can't comment on the fit. I do however like the feel of the plastic. It isn't super hard and has a little give which I think will be better vervus hard plastic. I bought them to eliminate skin abrasions not from breaks. I don't think any of the other ones would help with breaks either, if that's what you're going for.
customer_reviews.author: Joe403

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive, looks great, easy to wear
customer_reviews.text: We got these to go along with our daughter’s Bladerunner roller blades, which she loves. These are pink, so it’s already a winner with her. Easy to put on. Light weight. Some people say these are cheap and flimsy. Yeah, maybe they are, but these are going on kids who way 40-70 pounds maybe. They don’t need to be made the same way as ones for adults. Even if they fall apart after 1-2 crashes, I know they’ll do their job in protecting my kid and I don’t care if I’m out 10 bucks. I’ll buy another set if it happens.
customer_reviews.author: Mykeymic

customer_reviews.title: yes-and no
customer_reviews.text: purchased for my average-sized 5 year old granddaughter... the elbow and knee pads are just a tiny bit on the large side however the wrist guards are HUGE! gave these to her 8 year old sister. thus, I do not recommend this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Mary G.

customer_reviews.title: Fits my slim boned 6 year old
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I had read the other reviews and knew my daughter needed this small size for her frame. She is a cautious child by nature, so I am really pleased that she has learned quickly that with pads it doesn't hurt to fall while learning to roller skate. She is learning faster that she has with other activities because of it.
customer_reviews.author: Kikn

customer_reviews.title: Saved my kid from alot of hurt.
customer_reviews.text: The ONLY reason I'm not giving it 5 stars is the obviously cheap construction. Extremely happy with this purchase because I bought these thinking the wrist bands were a bonus. Whoa was I wrong. First time on the bike she falls off. Hits the concrete. Not a scratch on her. Landed on 4 surfaces of protection by these pads: hand, wrist, knee, and knee. One size fits most leaving room to grow, but the wrist bands appear to be for a girl much larger than 5 where the thumb goes through the hole. She managed though.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great product
customer_reviews.text: Great price, great product! These fit my 6.5 year old daughter perfectly. For the 4.5 year old, I had to adjust the straps a little to be tighter. But I'd buy these over and over again! Excellent quality.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget S.

customer_reviews.title: It's not as good as I thought
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my three-year-old daughter, the knee pads are just right, the hand guards are too big, the outer layer is hard plastic, can not be folded to adjust the size, if you can change the size to leather, it should be better
customer_reviews.author: Maggie.L

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old uses these with minimal complaint. They hurt under the knee, but I remember the same issue when I was a kid. I don't think that can be avoided.
customer_reviews.author: David Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Missing Pieces!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I should have listened to the negative reviews! I’m missing one of the pieces to this set! One of the hand guards isn’t in the set so we only have 1. Grrrrrr......
customer_reviews.author: Amazonlvr1123

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and Comfortable Pads
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put on and comfortable. My daughter wore these pads without complaining. They are also cute and affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Coupon Mom

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: Well I was excited to receive the item but it came incomplete. They forgot the elbow pads and quiet frankly it was unexceptable. Also the hand pads are extremely hard and uncomfortable. Not happy. I bought Kukome pads and way better for only $2 more.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous mommy

customer_reviews.title: Give them to our granddaughter today for her bday and ...
customer_reviews.text: Give them to our granddaughter today for her bday and had 2 knee pads but only had 1 elbow pad and 1 wraist protecter and I can’t fimd a way to get ahold of seller!! Don’t really want to order another set!
customer_reviews.author: Penny Fastenau

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money!
customer_reviews.text: These are just what we needed and I got 2 sets for the price of what I was willing to pay for one - so very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Clark

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: My little one was so scaree about getting while riding her bike. These helped her feel safe and comfort in riding her bike. Very good purchase
customer_reviews.author: Beth Hilbert

customer_reviews.title: Lousy fit.
customer_reviews.text: Not suitable for a 7 year old. They are very uncomfortable and if they aren't comfortable the child won't wear them.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Kinstler

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 7 yr old
customer_reviews.text: I got these to go with roller skates that I gave my 7 year old daughter for her birthday. I like that they came with the wrist guards and that the price wasn't that expensive. They fit nice and she likes them. I would recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa G.

customer_reviews.title: These have helped to keep my sweet little granddaughter
customer_reviews.text: These have helped to keep my sweet little granddaughter, Lucile, safe and free of harm while she zips and zooms about on her skates. She is such a sweet child and loves her Grammy very much.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Not very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My Grandaughter won't wear them, she said they don't feel good. Smaller than I expected and really stiff.
customer_reviews.author: HBowman

customer_reviews.title: Seems good
customer_reviews.text: Pads fit quite well. Wrist bands a little uncomfortable. Appears to be made of quality material.
customer_reviews.author: truekhristian

customer_reviews.title: Cycling pads
customer_reviews.text: Were Very hard to keep them on my daughter hands, the knee pads do not patch well on the knees.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Ok quality
customer_reviews.text: I chose these cause they seemed to be the smallest set for my one year old. They are an ok product. A little hard and not so comfortable but they serve the purpose so far. Don't really know how much protection they will give. It seems she may hurt herself more from wearing them than not cause they are so hard. Hopefully we will never find out.
customer_reviews.author: Tashona

customer_reviews.title: Not very small
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 5 and these pads are all too big for her. I don't like how they make the elastic to only work for larger kids. The pad sizes are fine, but the elastic just will not close tight enough to secure the pads to her body.
customer_reviews.author: AMZing

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: We like them, we still have them after 4 years but only about 20 uses. My daughter says they are not super comfortable, but I think they are worth buying for the price in case you want to see if your kids will really get into rollerblading, skateboarding etc. If they become super adventurous they may need something a bit better quality but for us, this do!
customer_reviews.author: AVH

customer_reviews.title: Good protection for your child's knees and elbows.
customer_reviews.text: Though my daughter complained about having to wear these, after one fall with a scrape I no longer had to tell her to wear them, as she saw the value in protecting herself after that.
customer_reviews.author: Reilly Hall

customer_reviews.title: Not the best but the price is right
customer_reviews.text: So they are cheap and do the job.Can’t expect more for the price.Daughter is happy!
customer_reviews.author: Ramona84

customer_reviews.title: Okay Quality
customer_reviews.text: It is good in this price range but quality is okay. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Raj Singh

customer_reviews.title: These bright pink protective gear for children is a nicely put together product
customer_reviews.text: These bright pink protective gear for children is a nicely put together product. I found the straps easy to adjust and other parts to slip on. I definitely wouldn't go wild with these aa they are meant for children but they could save a child from some scratches for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Joe K

customer_reviews.title: Good buy.
customer_reviews.text: These pads are easy enough for my 3.5 yr old to put on and take off on her own after I showef her how. The wrist pads are a little big but they velcro can catch and allows room to grow. Fortunately, she really hasn't had any major falls to test out the durability.
customer_reviews.author: Libby-Lu

customer_reviews.title: Please save your loved ones and don’t buy these
customer_reviews.text: Please do not buy these for your kids. My daughter fell and broke her elbow while wearing these. I recommend higher qualify protection, this is plain plastic from China

customer_reviews.title: It’s good for the price, Velcro quality isn’t that good
customer_reviews.text: The Velcro used isn’t good quality, it keeps coming off

customer_reviews.title: Super tiny!
customer_reviews.text: Soooo small! The straps were also very short and uncomfortable. Return process was horrible!

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Really cute and work well. My granddaughter used these for roller skates and she fell and the pads kept her from hurting herself

customer_reviews.title: too small for 8 year old good fit for 2-4 year old

customer_reviews.title: awesome

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old loves them- they serve their purpose!

customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my small 3 year old. 3ft 30lbs The knee and elbow pads fit okay but the wrist guard is too big.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 4 1/2 year old to use for ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 4 1/2 year old to use for ice skating lessons. She wears them under her snow pants and makes the experience fun.
customer_reviews.author: Kari Cheevers

customer_reviews.title: Look like decent quality. Will see once it gets nicer out so we can try them out
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my granddaughter who is learning to ride a bike. Shes afraid to fall so hoping this takes away the fear and she learns quicker!
customer_reviews.author: Sheila M.

customer_reviews.title: Good but started stretching out a bit.
customer_reviews.text: Fit well for my daughter learning to roller skate. The only complaint is they are starting to stretch out and are a little loose on her elbows and knees.

customer_reviews.title: softness
customer_reviews.text: i bought it for my nieces for riding bikes, it isn't very soft but ok with everything else.
customer_reviews.author: jim

customer_reviews.title: Good buy.
customer_reviews.text: Good buy... but wish the Velcro was longer to adjust appropriately to fit. Was loose in some areas and seemed a little tight in some areas. Purchased for my 7 year old daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Low priced, and low quality. I wish I ...
customer_reviews.text: Low priced, and low quality. I wish I went straight to the sporting goods store so I could see the quality of the pads first.
customer_reviews.author: Seacoast Mom

customer_reviews.title: Look good
customer_reviews.text: Recieved with roller skates I bought which was great! Look good and for a 7 yr old believe they will fit perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Zerhusen

customer_reviews.title: Missing wrist guard
customer_reviews.text: My package was missing a wrist guard and it is a pain to return the whole thing rather than just being able to call someone to send the missing part. I ordered a second one and hope between the two orders to get a full set.
customer_reviews.author: chrissy!

customer_reviews.title: Spend more get better
customer_reviews.text: Way too large for my daughter. Plastic wont protect anything except scrapes but as far as hend protection is worthless

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Our granddaughters are enjoying skating, and we are enjoying knowing they are safe!

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: Bought this over a month ahead of time for my granddaughters 4 th birthday....my mistake...didn’t open the box till today... Birthday is Wednesday....set of pads is missing 3 of the 6 pads....what a rip off! So disappointed! Was forced to give a star to submit!!
customer_reviews.author: Mia of 5

customer_reviews.title: Cheap material for everyday use.
customer_reviews.text: Not enough foam support underneath the pads. Will save you from scratches but will hurt under the pads. Velcro already falling apart in couple of days use. Wrist gloves are too big for pads size.

customer_reviews.title: ... the job done but not made out of the best material.
customer_reviews.text: Gets the job done but not made out of the best material.

customer_reviews.title: Durable, Value
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my daughter who kept scraping her knees on the sidewalks— she loves these and wears these all the time and is comfortable! Durable and great value for the money!

customer_reviews.title: Worked well!
customer_reviews.text: Good product , good price for the short time used after training wheels came off .

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed on the shipping of the product

customer_reviews.title: These hold up great. My 4yr old uses them often and still ...

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality.  Color is nice.

customer_reviews.title: Good price and functional
customer_reviews.text: These are a good price and are a perfect fit for my five and a half year old daughter, who is on the plump side. We're using them for both ice skating and biking and they're holding up fine.

customer_reviews.title: Rather poor quality, but I guess you get what you ...

product_meta.title: Fantasycart's kids Children Cycling Roller Skating Knee Elbow Wrist Protective Pads Pink
product_meta.description: You are buying one set(6 pieces) in pink. The Inline Skate Pads also suitable for skateboard, biking, minibike riding, and other extreme sports. Commodity: Wrist Elbow Knee Pads Package Includes: 2pcs knee pads, 2pcs elbow pads, 2pcs wrist pads. Material: Made of durable, soft EVA padded material with plastic plates. Bio-Foam padding for comfort and cooling. Wrist pads size: 13.5 x 9.5cm / 5.3" x 3.7" (L * W ). Elbow Protector Size: 12.5 x 10cm / 4.9" x 3.9" (L * W). Knee Protector Size : 14 x 10.5cm / 5.5" x 4.1" (L * W).
feature_bullets: Fantasycart is a registered brand. We are authorized seller.
